gnas pa chos nyid gnas pa ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug // bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin stong // 'bras bu thob dang dgra bcom sa la mi gnas shing // rang rgyal sa dang de bzhin sangs rgyas sar mi gnas// ji ltar 'dren pa 'dus ma byas khams mi gnas shing // de bzhin 'dus byas la yang mi gnas gnas med spyod// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas// gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs// gang dag bde gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa// bzod pa 'di la ma brten 'thob par mi nus te// dper na tshu rol pha rol 'gro dogs mi mthong bzhin// chos 'chad pa dang nyan dang bshad bya gang yin dang // 'bras bu thob dang rkyen rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon// mkhas pa gsal bas thob pa'i mya ngan 'das gang yin// de kun sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// gang zag bzhi po 'di dag de la mi skrag ste// rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang // dgra bcom dri ma bsal zhing som nyi spangs pa dang // bzhi pa dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su zin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig de ltar spyod pa ni// dgra bcom sa la mi slob rkyen rtogs sa la min// thams cad mkhyen nyid ched du sangs rgyas chos rjes slob// gang zhig slob mi slob la mi slob de slob yin// gzugs 'phel yongs su nyams dang yongs su gzung phyir min// chos rnams sna tshogs yongs su gzung phyir mi slob par// slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs 'dzin la// nges 'byung gang yin 'di ni yon tan dga' ba'i slob// gzugs ni shes rab ma yin gzugs la shes rab med// rnam shes 'du shes tshor dang sems pa 'di dag ni// shes rab ma yin 'di dag la yang shes rab med// 'di ni nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te tha dad med// dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de ni pha mtha' med// sems can rang bzhin gang yin de yang pha mtha' med// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha' med// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i shes rab de yang pha mtha' med// 'du shes tshu rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongs su bsgrags// 'du shes rnam par bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro// gang dag 'du shes bral ba 'di ni rjes thob pa// de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas// gal te ston pas kyang ni gang gA'i bye snyed kyi// bskal par bzhugs te sems can zhes sgra yongs bsgrags kyang // gzod nas dag pas sems can skye bar ga la 'gyur// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gang tshe nga ni pha rol phyin pa mchog 'di dang // 'thun par smra 'gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gis// ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes// nga lung bstan par gyur ces rgyal ba de skad gsung // shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang la mgon spyod pa// 'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'dzin dang chub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus mi tshugs// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glags kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gang gA yi// bye ma snyed kyis bye ba phrag stong zhing bkang ste// yongs su brtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis// las gzhan mi byed lha yi me tog spos rab dang // byug pas dus gsum bskal pa'am de bas lhag mchod la// gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba// bde bar gshegs kyi yum 'di glegs bam la bris te// 'chang zhing me tog byug pas bsti stang byed gyur na// mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni char mi phod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngags che// sems can khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed// gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med 'gyur// gang dag phan dang snying rjer bcas pa spyad spyod pa// rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg // 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa// bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya// sa bon btab nas sa la gnas te 'byung 'gyur ba// tshogs pa rnyed nas rnam mang gzugs dag rnam par skye// pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye// 'khor los sgyur rgyal lam gang nas ni rtag 'gro ba// lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun// gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro// de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol pa// gal te gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la// de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byur bur bltam gyur kyang // bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid len// ci slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags// 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgos pas mchod par bgyid// dper na rgyal po rten mi rim gro thob pa ltar// sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brten// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin thang med// gab tshe gang du stsal pa de ni phyag bgyi 'os// de phyung gyur kyang gab tshe la ni dga' bgyid de// yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de yi lags// de bzhin shes na// byang chub ces byar drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu mi shes bzhin// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang sems pa rnam par shes// mi rtag yongs su ston pa bcos la tshul du rab shes pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// la las gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams na// sems can ji snyed 'khod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas// gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te// sems can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags// ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas// chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed// de 'byung // byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yong med na// 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de bzhin du// mkhas pa shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan// dper na ma dros mtsho la klu bdag med gyur na// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chu klung 'bab par ga la 'gyur// chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi// ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung // ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub med// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na snang byed srog chags ji snyed pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams phyung ba bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung ches mchog ste// snang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi phod// nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bsgom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams tshogs skyed pa'ang // byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang sems gcig la// nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos par bya phyir rin chen chos ston pa// dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed bskyed pa nas// rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus// de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa// pha rol na lta gnas sems ni gsum la chags// dmigs pa yod pas yongs su bsngo bar chud ma yin// gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yongs su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na// de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su bsngos pa yin// gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin// ji ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin// ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba// dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba bslab bya ste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge ba de mkhyen pa'i// rnam pa gang yin 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yin la// rjes su yid rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo// de ltar bsod nams byang chub yongs su sngo byed na// dug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra// de ltar yongs bsngo dpa' bos 'jig rten dmigs can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed thams cad zil gyis gnon// dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams// lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di// dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin// gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin gyur na// de tshe mig rnyed gyur cing 'di yi ming thob bo// dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa// ji srid mig ma bris pas rngan pa mi thob bzhin// gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos// shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul 'bras bu dag par rig par bya// 'bras bu gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dag par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med gcad du med// // me btang rtswa dang shing dang nags tshal bsregs pa bzhin// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing yongs dag par// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin lta na// byed pa po yang mi dmigs ces// 'di ni nyan par mi 'gyur spong 'gyur bdud kyi las// de ltar mi shes de dag rtsa ba bor nas ni// rmongs pas yal ga dag dang 'dab ma tshol bar 'gyur// glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes ni tshol 'jig par rig par bya// so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yi// 'jigs pa med cing bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang // shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du ma rung 'gyur// dad pas shes rab kyis ni yongs su zin gyur na// sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang // nor dang bcas shing tshong par bcas te 'jig par 'gyur// gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na// mi 'jig nor dang bcas par ngogs su phyin par gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgos kyang // shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na// ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur// lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi// langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te// de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi yis brten byas na// 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba// rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang bar du nyams par 'gyur// de nyid thabs mkhas shes rab mchog gis yongs zin na// mi nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang // lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis// bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu bstan par bya// ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung // de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la bsten to zhes// yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal ba de skad gsung // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis// byang chub phung por zhen nas mchog 'dzin ma byed cig // dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa legs 'tsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang ni gnas yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dod pa// gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs yin// grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gyon byed de// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min// theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su bzung ba med// mi ldog g.yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can yin// de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med// the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'// sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par 'gyur med pa// de phyir phan mdzad brtser ldan byang chub brnyes nas ni// sems can tshogs su shes snyam thugs khral chung bar mdzad// sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod// 'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin// thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de// des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// nam mkha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pha mtha' yas// steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod// tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med// 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma byon de bzhin nyid// da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// chos kun de bzhin nyid gang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med// bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren pa'i shes rab med na thob par 'gyur ma yin// bya zhig lus che dpag tshad brgya rtsa lnga bcu par// gyur la 'dab gshog zad de nyam rtsal yod min na// de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir// bdag nyid mchongs na der ni nyam nyes gyur pa yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing // smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsten kyang // thabs med shes rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du ltung // sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang // 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid kyis brtul bya zhing // tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya// 'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa// yon tan rgya mtsho nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol// mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba// de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// tha dad 'du shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra// dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la rten mi byed// mkhas pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs// de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson// zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rjes su ston// chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig 'jam ldan// 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med// gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben zhing dag // rnyed 'dod ma yin khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa// bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog // bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan bsam gtan der mi gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med// khyim par gyur kyang rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags// 'tsho ba'i phyir ni yangs longs spyod tshol mi byed// drag shul spyod sngags mi byed bud med sbyor sngags min// 'dod pa'i las can pho mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed// rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// 'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang brtan// kun mkhyen 'dod cing brtan la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan// mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul mtha' rnam par spangs// rang gi sa la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra// chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson// mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams// zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med cing rab zhi ba// dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol ba ltar// shes rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i gting mi rnyed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab gyur cing // theg pa don dam chags med gang la phung po dang // khams dang skye mched yod min chos 'di rtogs pa de'i// bsod nams yang dag grub pa de las ci zhig yod// dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig // bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni// nyin gcig sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du// dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims srung byed kyang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos// brjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang tshul khrims char mi phod// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te// de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing // de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngo na// dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med// bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gsob dang ya ma brla dang snying po med par shes// de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyad spyod na// spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin// sangs rgyas kyis bshad rab tu sbyar cing rab bstan pa'i// chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes nas// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod byas kyang // chos kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin ces bya ba gang // chos de rnams kyang ming tsam du ni yongs su bsgrags// yongs bsngo rlom sems med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur// 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis// snying po tshig min de med par yang de mi tshig // me lce phrad pa tha mas snying po tshig min la// me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar// dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog reg ma yin la// de med par yang de la reg par nus ma yin// tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi ba thob min la// de med par yang de thob nus pa ma yin no// sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung // de yang 'gags la shing yang med pa der min ltar// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te// de yang 'gags la byang chub med pa de ma yin// chu yi thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar// rim gyis nyung ngu nyung ngus de yongs 'gengs pa ltar// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste// rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i chos spyod cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mar mi spyod pa// dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa phar 'gro tshur 'gro yang // mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag // stobs bcus lung bstan byang chub reg 'gyur rlom sems med// 'di la ci yang med ces byang chub skrag pa med// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// 'jig rten dgon pa'i lam dang mu ge nad bcas par// mthong nas skrag pa med cing de nas go gyon te// phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes nas// yongs su skyo ba'i yid ni rngul tsam skyed mi byed// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing // phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes// mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams la snying rje 'jug // bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi nyams// dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan zhing // stobs ldan mi thub brtson byas sgyu rtsal cho ga shes// 'phong dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // sgyu ma sgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig // pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas par yongs bsdus nas// dgra byed mang ba dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang / de yis dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu mang sprul te// bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin de tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang // sems can khams rnams kun tu snying rje cher bskyed cing // bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas// ting 'dzin mchog la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed// mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten// de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba brten// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste// nam mkha' gang la gnas yin don 'di bsam par gyis// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gnas pa// 'gro la sems can shes pa'i smon lam rten can gyis// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma ston byed cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg stong par gnas pa med// gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// stong pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'di spyod pa// bar skabs der ni mtshan ma rab tu sgom mi byed// mtshan ma med par gnas shing zhi la rab zhi spyod// bar snang 'phur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te/ de na gnas pa ma yin sa la ltung mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa// mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mar spyod ma yin// dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gnam du mda' 'phangs te// mda' gzhan dag gis phyi bzhin brgyud mar long btags te// snga ma'i mda' de sa la ltung ba'i skabs mi 'byed// mi de 'dod na mda' de sa la ltung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog spyod pa// shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam spyod pa// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob mi byed// dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig // nam mkhar gnas te cig char cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug pa ston// de ni skyo ba med cing de la dub pa med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong gnas shing // ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol son la gnas pa med// 'gro ba dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' yas ston// bskal pa bye bar skyo ba med cing dub pa med// dper na mi 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing // lag pa gnyi gas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing nam mkha' la// mchong bar byed cing g.yang sa chen por lus bor nas// ltung bar mi 'gyur ji srid der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs ni yongs bzung ste// chos rnams stong pa mtshan med smon pa med rtog cing // mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la chos kyang mthong // dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste// rin chen rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong 'gyur ba// der ni ded dpon 'ba' zhig bde bar 'tsho byed cing // gnyen bshes tshogs yid mi bder 'jog pa min pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid rin chen gyi// gling du song ste bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa// mya ngan 'das la reg pa 'ba' zhig mngon dga' zhing // sems can sdug bsngal yid du 'jog par 'gyur ma yin// dper na don gnyer tshong pa rgyus shes bya ba'i phyir// bar gyi grong khyer grong rdal grong gang yin par 'gro// der yang mi gnas rin chen gling du'ang mi gnas la// rig pa khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' gsal te nyan thos dang // rang rgyal rnams kyi shes pa rnam grol kun la mkhas// de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// 'dus ma byas la mi gnas lam gyi tshul shes yin// gang tshe 'gro la byams pas rjes su 'brel byas nas// ting 'dzin stong pa mtshan med smon pa med spyod pa// de ni mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur zhe'am// 'dus byas yin par gdags nus de ni gnas med do// dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin zhing // de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa// de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus ma yin// gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dris la// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i chos// yongs su mi ston phyir mi ldog pa sa yi chos// mi 'chad de ni lung ma bstan par rig par bya// dgra bcom sa dang rkyen gyi sangs rgyas ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing // sangs rgyas rnams mthong 'gro la chos kyang ston byed pa// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gcod smon lam 'debs// bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis me yi phung po zhi// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// mi yi 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nad mang ba// phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhi// 'on kyang rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// ci ste de ni bden pa'i byin rlabs sna tshogs dag // 'byor pas bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems 'byung ba'am// gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis lung bstan rlom// rlom sems gnas pa de ni blo chung shes par bya// ming gi gzhi las bdud ni nye bar 'ongs gyur nas// 'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes rgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin zhing // gang tshe khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming 'di yin// sbyangs sdom rnal 'byor ldan pa ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur la// khyod sngon yon tan tshul yang 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod do// de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rab tu dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa nags khrod rab tu sten byed cing // bdag stod gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor grong rdal gnas byed cing // sems can smin byed byang chub brtson pa ma gtogs par// de ni dgra bcom rang rgyal 'dod pa gzhan mi skye// 'di ni bde bar gshegs kyi sras kyis dben par gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri yi sul// sbrul gyis gang bar lo mang bye bar gnas byed kyang // dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtan dang // stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'dzin thob de la// 'di ni dgon dben spyod pa min snyam brnyas byed pa/ de ni bdud kyi spyod yul gnas zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung // theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral byang chub mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' drod snyam de ni bdag nyid nyams// de lta bas na byang chub dam pa tshol ba yis// bsam pa drag ldan mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom ste// nad pa'i tshogs kyi gso phyir sman pa bsten pa ltar// g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag // pha rol phyin dang bcas te dge ba'i bshes su bsten// de dag rjes su ston byed 'di ni bsgrub pa'i sa// rgyu rnam gnyis kyis sangs rgyas byang chub myur du rtogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcur gang bzhugs pa// kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin// pha rol phyin 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang sgron dang snang dang ston mchog yin zhes bshad// ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mtshan nyid stong // chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes shing // chos rnams stong zhing mtshan ma med par rab shes na// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// sems can yongs su rtog pa zas la 'dod byed cing // 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yang dag min stong ste// byis pa bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la mdud pa bor// dper na dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug bslang ba// dug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa// bdag der 'du shes yang dag mi rtag skye zhing 'chi// ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par byang bar gsungs// 'di la gang yang nyon mongs rnam dag 'gyur med par// byang chub sems dpas shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs// 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed ma lus pa// de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la// kun kyang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur bsngo yang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su 'thun byed na// de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi phod// de phyir g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med// de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur// rtag tu yul 'khor bsod snyoms don yod yongs su spyod// byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir yun ring 'brel ba yi// lha mi ngan song gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la ston 'dod pas// nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya// mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa yi rin chen mchog // dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga' ba las// rnyed ma thag tu bag med gyur te stor na ni// stor bas rin chen mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug bsngal lo// de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen lta bu yi// shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya// rin chen rnyed nas blangs te rab tu brtson dkris nas// myur du 'gro bar byed pa zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin// nyi ma sprin dang bral ba'i 'od zer dra ba can// mun nag thibs po mun pa thams cad 'joms 'char ba// srin bu me khyer srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang // skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis gnon// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin// mchog spyod stong pa dang ni mtshan ma med spyod pa// mkhas pas lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas 'gro kun dang // dgra bcom rang rgyal byang chub sems mang zil gyis gnon// dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor gyur te mngon par 'gro bya 'os// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang dga' byed// thabs thob gyur te rgyal srid gnas nas smos ci dgos// de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang phan brtson// chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur nas smos ci dgos// de yi tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// mya ngan nyam thag sdug bsngal yid mi bde nyam chung // ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes// 'jigs pa bstan phyir phyogs rnams sreg cing skar mda' gtong // gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa drag ldan zhing // nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog don lta// de tshe lus sems dag ni mkha' 'gro bya ltar rgyu// nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags rnyed ga la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing // phan tshun mi 'thun khros pa'i sems dang ldan gyur pa// de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tu nyams bder 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring 'gyur snyam// de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur// gnyi ga rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod// de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te dga' bar 'gyur// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byed na// tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par gzhi nas go cha bgo bgos so// sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg // sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing // so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la// dga' bar mi byed de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// gang zhig slob tshe bslab pa gang yang khas mi len// slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing // bslab dang bslab pa ma yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa// de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta'i bslab 'di shes// de ni gzhar yang bslab nyams tshul khrims 'chal mi 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas chos mnyes bya phyir 'di la slob// de ni bslab lhag bslab la mkhas te dmigs pa med// mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyi shes rab de ltar slob// dge ba ma yin sems gcig tsam yang skyed mi byed// nyi ma mkha' la 'gro ba'i zer gyis zil gnon pa'i// mdun gyi bar snang la ni mun pa mi gnas bzhin// shes rab pha rol phyin la bslab pa byas rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur// 'jig tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par gsungs// dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags nyan thos yon tan gang dag dang // de bzhin rang rgyal yon tan kun la slob byed cing // de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi bskyed de// 'di ni bdag gis bslab bya yin snyam de phyir slob// mi ldog byang smras so// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rtag tu ngu legs so legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus kyang sgra thos te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis/ dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba las chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar sgrub ste/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas pas 'grogs shing bsten pa dang / bsnyen par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so// 'di ni sems can gdul ba'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la bsten cing 'grogs te/ bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa'am/ sgrib pa med kyis/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ brag ca lta bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig // rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam nas/ de sa phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de smre zhing 'dug go// de sa phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/ nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi'am/ lnga 'am/ bdun 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yid la byed pa mi skyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ mtshan mor yid la byed pa mi skyed/ nyin mor yid la byed pa mi skyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smra ba legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / 'dod du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing // shar phyogs nyid du song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/ spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor ba rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang / mis gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas mda' yab cig shos gzhan dang 'brel pa/ grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khebs te gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyan la/ yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing chu ha cang yang mi grang // ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do// chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can de dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o// chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs che zhing bzang la/ dri zhim po'i ngad ldang ba gzhan pa dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing // me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba/ dmar po kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do// rdzing bu de dag thams cad na/ ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka ra na da dang / bzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing ris su bcad pa med de/ 'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ldan zhes bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas/ ngos gsum pa ni bai dUr+ya las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi ni ke ke ru la/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang // them skas them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pa la dang / pad ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing // ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / bzhad rnams skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan/ dri dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to// des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig // chongs shig // lhogs shig // kun chub par gyis shig // gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig // kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton tu bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur sti bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed par bya gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis phangs pa dang / dad pa dang gus par byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig // kun dga' bo ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do// rjes su yongs su gtad do// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang ston pa dang kha ton du byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o//
